name: Secrets of the Human Brain
miscellaneous: Secrets: First faction to discover gains free tech.

quote.text: There are only two ways in which we can account for a necessary agreement of experience with the concepts of its objects: either experience makes these concepts or these concepts make experience possible.

description: All past research on memory, learning, the senses, and other aspects of the brain did not answer one basic question: what is the biological mechanism of self awareness? Research into Biogenetics (D1) and Social Psych (B1) finally resolves the last of the Secrets of the Human Brain, providing an understanding of the fundamentals of conciousness.
